Sentencas: This work focuses on a DG-SOFC-MGT (downdraft gasifier - solid oxide fuel cell - micro gas turbine) power plant for electrical energy production and investigates two possible performance-upgrading systems: polyphenylene oxide (PPO) membrane and zeolite filters.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: The first is used to produce oxygen-enriched air used in the reactor, while the latter separates the CO2 content from the syngas.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: In order to prevent power plant shutdowns during the gasifier reactor scheduled maintenance, the system is equipped with a gas storage tank.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: The generation unit consists of a SOFC-MGT system characterized by higher electrical efficiency when compared to conventional power production technology (IC engines, ORC and EFGT).
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: Poplar wood chips with 10% of total moisture are used as feedstock.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: Four different combinations with and without PPO and zeolite filtrations are simulated and discussed.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: One-year energy and power simulation were used as basis for comparison between all the cases analyzed.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: The modeling of the gasification reactions gives results consistent with literature about oxygen-enriched processes.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: Results showed that the highest electrical efficiency obtained is 32.81%.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: This value is reached by the power plant equipped only with PPO membrane filtration.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: Contrary to the PPO filtering, zeolite filtration does not increase the SOFC-MGT unit performance while it affects the energy balance with high auxiliary electrical consumption.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: This solution can be considered valuable only for future work coupling a CO2 sequestration system to the power plant.
Titulo: Effects of upgrading systems on energy conversion efficiency of a gasifier - fuel cell - gas turbine power plant
